definition: that very night/through the night/for several nights in a row
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)

pinyin: wu1 lou4 pian1 feng2 lian2 ye4 yu3
wu1 lou4 geng4 zao1 lian2 ye4 yu3

definition: see 屋漏偏逢連夜雨|屋漏偏逢连夜雨[wu1 lou4 pian1 feng2 lian2 ye4 yu3]
pinyin: po4 wu1 you4 zao1 lian2 ye4 yu3

sentences.english: She rushed to town that very night.
He teamed with Chinese Premier Wen Jiabao to draft a late-night compromise.
sentences.chinese: 他和中国总理温家宝连夜共同起草了一份折衷协定。

sentences.english: Then we got on some horses, and rode away through the night.
sentences.chinese: 于是我们骑上马，连夜骑马离开。

sentences.english: As hoped, the Home Returning Corps took fright and fled in the night.
sentences.chinese: 还乡团果然害怕，连夜逃跑了。

sentences.english: House leakage slants meet rain of the same night, the ship breaking met the head wind.
sentences.chinese: 屋漏偏逢连夜雨，船破又遇顶头风。

sentences.english: Mr. Jonquil packs the mushrooms in cardboard boxes and ships them overnight to restaurants and wholesalers.
sentences.chinese: 琼基尔把蘑菇装在纸板箱里，连夜运给饭店和批发商。

sentences.english: Zhang Qishan busy night live in changsha, withdraw money from the bank.
sentences.chinese: 张启山忙连夜通电长沙，从银号提钱。

sentences.english: Night after night XuanZu summoned the minister to discuss.
sentences.chinese: 宣祖连夜召集众臣商议。

sentences.english: Eight people were arrested with weapons overnight, the interior minister said.
sentences.chinese: 内政部长说，已经连夜逮捕了8名武装分子。

sentences.english: The Wuchang that immediately perianth caught, starting the night into the ambush site.
sentences.chinese: 那五常得知马上花被抓，连夜出发进入伏击地点。

sentences.english: My national security team has led an interagency effort overnight.
sentences.chinese: 我们的国家安全人员连夜带头开展部际合作。

sentences.english: After the banquet, the minister handed in his resignation that very night.
sentences.chinese: 于是，宴会结束后，他连夜向国君递交了辞呈。

sentences.english: Ellie afraid, they have broken the red queen, then to see the night overnight.
sentences.chinese: 艾丽怕红中皇后会坏了她们的大计，便连夜来见夜犬。

sentences.english: L.A. is overnighting us their file.
sentences.chinese: 这是洛杉矶给我们连夜快递过来的文件。

sentences.english: The company accommodated the customer‘s wish and sent the delivery overnight.
sentences.chinese: 公司满足了顾客的愿望，连夜将货物发了出去。

sentences.english: The work had to be finished before the night was out.
sentences.chinese: 这项工作必须连夜赶完。

definition: at dawn/at first light/first thing in the morning
at top speed/at a tremendous lick
to travel at double speed/to make all haste
to overtake/to catch up with/to hurry/to rush/to try to catch (the bus etc)/to drive (cattle etc) forward/to drive (sb) away/to avail oneself of (an opportunity)/until
